data.title: Certificate in Xero
data.meta_description: Upskilled's Certificate in Xero course is the quick and easy way to learn how to manage business accounts using Xero software. Ideal for business owners, managers, and anyone looking to advance their career, this course offers practical knowledge and a strong understanding of Xero
data.text:
Looking to gain a competitive edge in your business or accounting career? The Certificate in Xero is the course for you! Our flexible online study options allow you to work at your own pace, in your own time and earn 15 Continuing Professional Development hours while receiving unlimited tutor support from experienced professionals.

Upon completion of the course, you'll receive Xero's official advisor certification, which is a frequent request of employers. But the benefits don't stop there - with the Certificate in Xero, you'll gain a strong understanding and practical knowledge of Xero to advance your business or career.

Our course covers a wide range of Xero functions, including customising your chart of accounts, creating and customizing invoice templates, managing bills and payments and creating and reviewing financial reports. Plus, as a Xero Education Partner, we provide updated course content and the latest Xero functions, tips, and tricks.

What will you get?

Learn to use Xero for managing business accounts

Gain practical knowledge of Xero for career advancement

Receive an industry-recognized qualification

Earn 15 Continuing Professional Development hours

Get unlimited tutor support from experienced professionals

Enjoy flexible online study options

Access updated course content and Xero tips and tricks through The Career Academy's partnership with Xero Education

Xero's official advisor certification

Who is this course for?

This course is suitable for business owners, managers, accountants or anyone managing business accounts who wants to learn how to use Xero accounting software effectively. It is also suitable for individuals who are looking to advance their career by gaining practical knowledge and a recognized qualification in Xero. The flexible online study options make it ideal for those who need to study at their own pace and in their own time.

Certificate in Xero is recommended for (but not limited to) for those in the roles of:

Business and Payroll Administrators: Business and payroll administrators can benefit from the Certificate in Xero to gain practical knowledge and streamline their business and payroll processes.

Accountants and Bookkeepers: The Certificate in Xero can help you enhance your accounting and bookkeeping skills, which are valuable in the industry.

Business Owners and Managers: Business owners and managers can benefit from the Certificate in Xero to gain practical knowledge and streamline their accounting processes.

Financial Analysts: Financial analysts can benefit from the Certificate in Xero to gain practical knowledge and improve their data analysis skills.

Tax Professionals: Tax professionals can benefit from the Certificate in Xero to gain practical knowledge and enhance their tax-related skills.

Why should you do this course?

Receive an industry-recognised qualification: Completing the Certificate in Xero means that you'll receive an official Xero advisor certification, which is recognized by the industry. This acknowledgement of your skills can be shared with potential employers and peers.

Access to updated learning content and resources: As a Xero Education Partner, The Career Academy provides updated course content and the latest Xero functions, tips and tricks, in addition to unlimited tutor support from experienced professionals.

Flexible online study: The Certificate in Xero is designed for busy professionals and allows you to work at your own pace, in your own time. You will have up to 6 months to complete the course.

Suitable for a range of accounting and financial roles: The Certificate in Xero is suitable for individuals who hold accounting and financial roles or aspire to do so, including accountants, bookkeepers, business owners, managers, financial analysts, payroll administrators and tax professionals.

The Certificate in Xero comprises nine modules/courses that provide comprehensive training in using Xero. By the end of your studies, you'll receive a Certificate in Xero that acknowledges your unique skill set, which you can share with potential employers and your peers.

In this course, you'll learn to:

Use Xero's dashboard and navigate the program

Create and manage a chart of accounts

Manage contacts in Xero, including customers, suppliers and employees

Create invoices, sales, quotes and inventory

Manage purchases and bills in Xero

Perform bank reconciliation in Xero

Generate and view interactive reports in Xero

Use Xero's add-ons and apps

Complete a practical case study based assessment using Xero

The Certificate in Xero provides valuable skills in financial management and bookkeeping, suitable for anyone who wants to gain expertise in using Xero for their personal or professional development.
